title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
summary: This lesson covers the fundamental concepts of AI, its history, and various applications in the modern world. You will learn about different types of AI and their impact on society.

title: Machine Learning Basics
summary: Dive into the core principles of machine learning, including supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning. Understand how algorithms learn from data and make predictions.

title: Deep Learning and Neural Networks
summary: Explore the advanced concepts of deep learning, focusing on neural networks, their architecture, and how they are trained. Discover the power of deep neural networks in complex problem-solving.

title: AI Ethics and Future Trends
summary: Examine the ethical considerations surrounding AI development and its societal implications. Discuss the future trends and potential challenges in the field of artificial intelligence.
